author: Joanne Rosa
title: Wash. governor calls Mitch McConnell's suggestion states file for bankruptcy 'nuts'
description: Washington Governor Jay Inslee reacts to Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell's statement that states should consider bankruptcy on "The View" Thursday, April 23, 2020.
content:
Washington Gov. Jay Inslee hopes Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell will retract a statement in which he said that states should consider filing for bankruptcy rather than asking the federal government for fiscal relief.
Inslee appeared on the "The View"… [+4844 chars]
